title: Non-Conforming Activities: All activities which were previously existing shall be allowed to be relocated regardless of the non- conforming nature of the activities, except those which are hazardous and highly polluting, and except in cases where the alternative accommodation has already been allotted elsewhere by the MCGM
clause_text: Non-Conforming Activities: All activities which were previously existing shall be allowed to be relocated regardless of the non- conforming nature of the activities, except those which are hazardous and highly polluting, and except in cases where the alternative accommodation has already been allotted elsewhere by the MCGM.
section: Commercial / Office / Shop / Economic Activity Free of Cost:
